```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
datafest <- clicks
```

```{r,message=FALSE}
datafest1 <- datafest %>%
  select(date_time,user_location_country, user_location_city, orig_destination_distance,
         is_package, srch_ci, srch_co,is_booking) %>%
  filter(is_booking=='1')

```
